Text.Page: Those {@LinkCreature:25#2041#Lokian snipers} and {@LinkCreature:25#2042#Lokian blood reapers} keep herding us through the Dark Cathedral and away from our targets. Will you help us clear the way?
Good job! We can handle the rest. Though, I wish I had more information about the Atel Akaad. Defending is easyâ€”I'd rather crush them.
